meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Compass, Compass Academy, Charter, Charter School, Vineland School, Vineland, Let Me Learn, Charter School New Jersey, Charter School NJ, Compass Academy Charter School

meta.name: description
meta.content: Compass Academy Charter School, a NJDOE Tier 1 school, located in Vineland, New Jersey (NJ) offers a free, comprehensive education for students in grades Kindergarden through 5th grade. Using the Let Me Learn process empowers students to take ownership over their own learning.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Compass Academy Charter School, a NJDOE Tier 1 school, located in Vineland, New Jersey (NJ) offers a free, comprehensive education for students in grades Kindergarden through 5th grade. Using the Let Me Learn process empowers students to take ownership over their own learning.

Compass Academy Charter School, a NJDOE Tier 1 school, located in Vineland, New Jersey (NJ) offers a free, comprehensive education for students in grades Kindergarden through 5th grade. Using the Let Me Learn process empowers students to take ownership over their own learning.

div.class: standardHeaderLayout dm-bfs dm-layout-home hasAnimations hasStickyHeader inMiniHeaderMode hamburger-reverse dmPageBody d-page-1716942098 dmFreeHeader

b.font: Compass approved for Pre-K to start Sept. 2020

span.b: Governor Murphy has extended NJ School Closures through at least 5/15 to ensure the safety and health of everyone.

Next Remote Board Meeting, Tuesday, 4/21
Conference Call (701) 801-6381 (no access code necessary)

div.font: Meals will be available for pickup twice a week, Monday and Wednesday, 9AM - 11AM, due to the Governor’s Shelter-in-Place order.
We will distribute Monday and Tuesday meals on Monday, and Wednesday through Friday meals on Wednesday. There will be NO meal pickup on Tuesday, Thursday or Friday.
NJ Child Care Options can be viewed here.
View the Keep Americans Connected Pledge (free Internet access) here.

Dear Parents - This is a friendly reminder to regularly monitor your child’s work while schools are closed. Students must keep up with their online lessons or, in some cases, paper packets. Falling behind presents a risk of failing. Thank you for all of your support to ensure that our students continue to learn. For information on how to log on to Google Classroom, Google Hangout/Meet, or any tech site, please contact Edwin Wargo at 856-404-0462 / ewargo@compassacs.org

font.font: Compass has created a Remote Instruction Website that can be found here:

div.class: dmRespCol small-12 u_1414742659 medium-12 large-12 content-removed

div.span: An exceptional, free, Tier 1 Charter School with proven results

font.span: Where all children will learn, lead, and become the future.

a.class: u_1918342143 dmButtonLink dmWidget dmWwr default dmOnlyButton dmDefaultGradient hide-for-small

font.span: The Mission of the Compass Academy Charter School is to increase each child’s success in learning and as a result, academic achievement. Using the Let Me Learn Process® as its innovative approach, the school leadership and teachers will help students develop a stronger sense of self as learners, a greater degree of academic achievement, and a healthy lifestyle for learning.

span.style: font-family: ABeeZee; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-weight: inherit;

div.font: The staff at Compass are trained, certified professionals who excel in their field. Many of our educators also have supplemental training in alternative learning strategies.
Small class sizes means your child gets individual attention and won't be overlooked.

div.span: Compass uses Let Me Learn - a proven, tested way for students to identify how they best learn.
Data is used to ensure students are learning to their full potential. What's more - students track their own learning styles through Let Me Learn. Students in Grades K-5 have use Google Chromebooks.

a.class: u_1127372981 align-center dmButtonLink dmWidget dmWwr default dmOnlyButton dmDefaultGradient

div.span: The Department of Education ranked all schools in New Jersey on a scale of 0 to 100.
The following data was used for the ranking score:

div.font: English language arts growth (20 percent), math growth (20 percent), progress toward English language proficiency (20 percent), English language arts proficiency (15 percent), math proficiency (15 percent), chronic absenteeism (10 percent)

a.class: align-center dmButtonLink dmWidget dmWwr default dmOnlyButton dmDefaultGradient
a.span: Enroll your child in Cumberland County's best free public school.

div.class: dmRespCol small-12 medium-6 large-6 u_1094029783 hasBackgroundOverlay

span.i: "We are not a school that you choose because you have no other choice; we are the only school of choice for educational excellence."
